statements: UPDATE player_profiles SET player_score = 150 WHERE player_id = 1;
UPDATE player_profiles SET player_email = 'example@email.com', player_name = 'John Doe' WHERE player_id = 2;
UPDATE player_profiles SET player_score = player_score + 10 WHERE player_id = 1
UPDATE player_profiles SET player_name = 'Alice', player_email = 'alice@example.com' WHERE player_id = 2
UPDATE player_profiles SET player_level = 10, player_score = 500 WHERE player_id = 101
UPDATE player_statistics SET total_wins = 20, total_losses = 5, games_played = 35 WHERE player_id = 201
UPDATE player_profiles SET player_score = player_score + 10, player_level = 5 WHERE player_id = 12345;
UPDATE player_statistics SET games_played = games_played + 1, total_wins = total_wins + 1, total_losses = total_losses - 1 WHERE player_id = 54321;
UPDATE player_profiles SET player_email = 'example@email.com' WHERE player_id = 123
UPDATE player_statistics SET losses = 5, wins = 10 WHERE player_id = 456
UPDATE player_profiles SET player_rank = 10, player_name = 'John Doe' WHERE player_id = 1;
UPDATE player_statistics SET games_played = 50, wins = 30, losses = 20 WHERE player_id = 2;
UPDATE player_profiles SET username='JohnDoe', email='john.doe@example.com' WHERE player_id=1;
UPDATE leaderboard SET score=1000, ranking=1 WHERE player_id=3;
UPDATE player_profiles SET email = 'newemail@example.com', username = 'new_username' WHERE player_id = 123;
UPDATE leaderboard SET score = 1000, ranking = 5 WHERE player_id = 456;
UPDATE player_profiles SET player_level = 5 WHERE player_id = 101;
UPDATE player_statistics SET games_played = 20, wins = 15, losses = 5 WHERE player_id = 102;
UPDATE player_profiles SET player_email = 'new_email@example.com' WHERE player_id = 1;
UPDATE player_statistics SET wins = wins + 1, losses = losses - 1 WHERE player_id = 3;
